title: Jating
author: Jating
content: https://x.com/PeterSchiff/status/1192802503856984064Oh well, another comedy gold from Peter, and you can see someone replied that it is going to happen after 5 years and he is spot on.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: This has been discussed recently on this forum. You can see it here: A long time ago, Peter Schiff said this...Peter Sheriff accepted later that he got that wrong when bitcoin got above $95000 or so.

comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: You can’t blame him, he’s a stockbroker and naturally leans toward traditional assets. Bitcoin isn’t for everyone, and some experts still doubt it because they struggle to see its inherent value. But that doesn’t mean his opinion won’t change. Plenty of big names in the past were anti-Bitcoin at first but eventually came around and invested. Even if he sticks to his stance, though, the Bitcoin market will keep growing regardless.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on November 24, 2024, 08:14:11 AMOh well, another comedy gold from Peter, and you can see someone replied that it is going to happen after 5 years and he is spot on.You can not find any person who can be more anti-Bitcoin than Peter Schiff.Quote from: PeterSchiff in November 2019It looks like the #Bitcoin pump is finally over.  Get ready for the dump!Keep dreaming.  Bitcoin is never going to hit $100,000!In 2019, it is a bearish market year and price was lower than $20,000 which is 2018 ATH (a litle bit lower than $20,000). Five years later, from 2019 to 2024, price is more than five-fold since 2018 ATH, and if we compare to 2019 price, it would be higher than x5 because in November 2019, price starts above $9,000 and fell to about $7,200 in late of that month.Peter Shiff and his company sells gold and has products related to gold. He knows that whole capital around the world is zero-sum, if more people are interested in and invest their capital into Bitcoin market, less people and less capital will be in Gold market.You don't have to convince Peter Schiff or change his mind, it's his business, but you can read this The bullish case for Bitcoin and strengthen your belief in Bitcoin, then say no to gold.Sometimes you can receive notifications from exchange applications like "Bitcoin price dips below $98,000". It's ironic and Peter Schiff likes it.

Sure it may feel them stupid now but back then many of them didn't have enough evidence to completely trust bitcoin as an investment opportunity. However, if at this point and you are still skeptical of bitcoin I am going to have to say that that is already actual stupidity. Investing in bitcoin is seen as one of the most profitable opportunities as of the moment and if you still can't see why then maybe you are really not understanding the concept of bitcoin.Quote Even if he sticks to his stance, though, the Bitcoin market will keep growing regardless.Many big names can keep talking about bitcoin negatively but the masses understand bitcoin and see it on an objective point of view. So yes it will continue to increase in value no matter how many fiat loving and crypto hating names spread things about bitcoin.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: As they say "The internet is written in ink" making such silly "predictions" is always going to come back to haunt you Such statements would have made sense back in 2010-2011 when bitcoin was still new and the future was unclear. But today people still make such silly statements with confidence which makes no sense! Even back in 2019 where the initial tweet is from, it was a silly thing to predict after seeing the fantastic performance and the potential to grow only two years before through 2017, not to mention 10 years of solid growth up until 2019.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: So many people have called BTC different names, they said it was a bubble that would burst and would never rise again, Peter Schiff said BTC would never get to $100,000, and there are so many people who have made wrong statements and predictions about BTC that didn't even make it to the internet. Good thing is that BTC has an actual utility, so it is surely going to prove them wrong, BTC is not like altcoins, it has use cases, real world use, so people who make silly predictions about it either do not understand what BTC is or they just want to badmouth it.

comments.body: Peter was wrong 5 years ago and unless he changes his stance based on the evidence before him and not peer pressure from people, he will continue to be wrong. Even his son doesn't buy his advice with regards to bitcoin. Just like Gary, Elon his opinion on bitcoin is insignificant. I thought to share the picture I found on Reddit.

comments.author: cr1776
comments.body: Schiff is right about some things, but he has a blind spot when it comes to bitcoin and he and anyone who has followed his advice has been the worse for it.  It is too bad.  Eventually maybe he'll come around and still have another order of magnitude or two of fiat term growth to go.
